name: Springtime (FPGames)
description:
In this game you have your own store, where you sell plants. Your goal is to get the highest score possible in 50 days.  You can increase it by selling plants and by watering them.

Planting tulips will  increse your score by  1, planting roses will increase it by 2, planting sunflowers by 3 and planting trees by 4.  Watering plants will increase your score by 1.

When it is raining  you don't need to  water  plants.

This game was created in 10 days for the Great Spring Game Jam 2021.

I hope you enjoy!
